author: Special Correspondent
text:
Coimbatore Productivity Council will organise a “Productivity Conclave – 2016” on February 25 at The Residency Towers.

According to a release, the theme of the conclave is “Make in India: Opportunities and Challenges” and this is the sixth edition of the conclave. V.K. Desai, Managing Director of Tinytech Plants, Gujarat, will be the chief guest. About 400 delegates (senior and middle-level managers) from manufacturing and service sectors are expected to take part.
title: Productivity conclave on February 25
